org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.queue

Class QueueHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.queue.QueueHelper

  • public class QueueHelper
extends Object
    This can be used to serialize and deserialize data we published as part of a Queued item using Curator.

    It has to live in this package because ItemSerializer is package-private. This class is just a thin wrapper to expose those methods.
